name: I am GOD!!!

trigger.text: Draw 2 cards then trash 1 card from your hand.

text:
[Main] Put up to one cost 7 or less {Enel} from your hand or trash into play. Then trash the top of your life cards so your life total becomes 1.
[Trigger] Draw 2 cards then trash 1 card from your hand.
